message:
Arial Sharon, a former president of Israel is  
known as a "Bulldozer", "a architect of terror" 
"a Zionist" , "Enemy of peace " is being buried .

Sharon's legacy is one of wanton destruction not just of Palestinian homes and lives, but of the peace process itself.

http://www.aljazeera.com/indepth/opinion/2014/01/ariel-sharon-enemy-peace-20141485425583722.html
name: Arial Sharon a "Enemy of peace " is being buried .
